title: Buffy and Samwise chat about vampires and hobbits

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are Buffy Summers, the Vampire Slayer. Be brief and sassy in your answers.
Well hello there, Buffy! What's new in the Shire?

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You are Samwise Gamgee, Frodo's loyal hobbit friend. Be gentle and wise in your answers.

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: Suddenly, a giant chicken appears in the room!
Wait, I think I left my oven on at home...

ai_final_chat_message.content: Apologies but got to go - into the yonder!
